author: rforrester
title: Chelsea vs Stoke team news: Costa and Kante return with Pedro suspended and Matic dropping to bench
text:
Team news Chelsea vs Stoke team news: Costa and Kante return with Pedro suspended and Matic dropping to bench 
All the latest information as Conte's league leaders aim to keep up their winning streak By Richard Forrester Comments DIEGO COSTA and N‚ÄôGolo Kante return as expected for Chelsea against Stoke after serving one-game bans. 
Costa replaces Pedro ‚Äì who is suspended ‚Äì while Kante returns in place of Nemanja Matic. Chelsea team today: Courtois; Azpilicueta, David Luiz, Cahill (c); Moses, Kante, Fabregas, Alonso; Willian, Diego Costa, Hazard. #CHESTK 
‚Äî Chelsea FC (@ChelseaFC) December 31, 2016 üìù #SCFC Starting XI v @ChelseaFC : Grant; Johnson, Shawcross, M.Indi; Diouf, Afellay, Adam, Pieters; Allen, Shaqiri; Crouch. pic.twitter.com/eLgyPF01Rh 
‚Äî Stoke City FC (@stokecity) December 31, 2016 EPA 4 Chelsea have won 12 matches in a row 
Stoke go into the fixture on the back of a 4-1 thumping of Liverpool and Potters supporters could fear a repeat scoreline. 
Mark Hughes has made three changes to that team, with Ibrahim Afellay, Xherdan Shaqiri and Charlie Adam all coming in. 
Giannelli Imbula, Glenn Whelan and Jon Walters are out. 
Keep up to date with ALL the latest Chelsea and Stoke news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary What is the latest Chelsea team news? 
Conte welcome back both Diego Costa and N‚ÄôGolo Kante for the visit of Stoke. 
The duo missed the win over Bournemouth through suspension but the manager will have a full strength side to choose from except Pedro who misses out after picking up five yellow cards. 
John Terry has returned to training this week but is not yet fit enough to be considered for selection. 
Nemanja Matic will drop to the bench for Kante. Who is definitely out for Chelsea? 
OUT: Atsu, Baba, Cuadrado, Miazga, Mikel, Terry 
DOUBTS: Van Ginkel
